author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "The key to victory is the element of surprise. Surprise!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, have you ever met a woman who makes you quiver like a bowl of Jell-O?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I find the most erotic part of a woman is the boobies."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "If I said you had a beautiful body, would you take your pants off and dance around a little?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "When I'm in command, every mission is a suicide mission."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Pick up that object. Pick it up! Now, put it down. Good."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I've never seen such a display of cowardice in all my life, and I've seen some displays."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "What's the matter, Kif? Is the velour too much for you?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "My instinct is to hide in this barrel, like the bowl of pudding that I am."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, you're fired."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "The path to a woman’s heart is through her parents. Have a sex change and marry her father."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Wave after wave of my own men."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Leela, I've sent you a card every year. Each one more passionate than the last."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif! Why is this ship shaking?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Brannigan’s love is like Brannigan’s law: hard and fast!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "That's for schoolgirls. Now here's a course for men."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I believe you’ll find that everything is A-OK. Or should I say, Grey-O-K?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "One day, a man has everything. Then the next day, he blows up a billion dollar space station."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I don't pretend to understand Brannigan's Law. I merely enforce it."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "We have a fail-safe system. If the ship should ever go off course, it automatically explodes."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I'm bored. What's on the schedule for today?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "My God, we're defenseless, like some sort of non-defensive object!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, undress me. Slowly, like you're peeling a grape."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm going to fly this ship the way I live my life: with no regard for safety or common sense."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, show them the medal I won."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "It's a very sensual ship, Kif. Isn't she?"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "In the name of all that is holy, Kif, get me a sandwich!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "War is the H-word, and I'm the man who's going to win it."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Let's show these aliens what for! And by 'what for,' I mean 'death!'"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I'm feeling a little bit lonely. Come here and sit on my lap."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Fire all weapons! Even the ones we haven't invented yet!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I'm going to need you to lead the charge. I'll be right behind you, in the escape pod."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Who's the man? I'm the man!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I've never been so insulted in all my life! And I've been insulted a lot!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, bring me my velour jumpsuit. The one with the plunging neckline."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm Zapp Brannigan, the greatest hero the galaxy has ever known!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I've got a plan. It's a very complicated plan, involving a lot of lasers and a giant mirror."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "The only thing I'm afraid of is... nothing! I'm not afraid of anything!"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, get me a drink. Something with an umbrella in it."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm a man of action, Kif. And my action is... taking a nap."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, tell the men I'm proud of them. Even the ones I've already killed."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm going to save the galaxy, Kif. And I'm going to look good doing it."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I've got a feeling this is going to be our finest hour. Or at least our most expensive."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I'm going to need you to pilot the ship. I'm too busy being fabulous."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I've got a secret weapon, Kif. It's called 'charisma.'"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, tell the aliens to surrender or face the wrath of my velour."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm not just a captain, Kif. I'm a work of art."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I've got a date with destiny. And by 'destiny,' I mean 'Leela.'"

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm going to win this war, Kif. And then I'm going to write a book about it."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I'm feeling a little bit hungry. Get me a space-burger."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I'm feeling a bit racy. Fetch me my evening thong."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm a man of simple tastes, Kif. I like my women beautiful and my enemies dead."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, tell the men to fire at will! And if Will isn't there, fire at someone else."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "I'm Zapp Brannigan, and I've never lost a battle! Except for the ones I didn't win."

author: Futurama, Zapp Brannigan
text: "Kif, I've got a hunch. And my hunches are never wrong, except when they are."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "The use of words expressing something other than their literal intention! Now that is irony!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Please stop! I'll give you whatever you want! Just stop playing!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Your hands are cold."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm the Robot Devil, and I'm here to take what's mine!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Oh, the irony! A man who lived for science, now a victim of science!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're a very good person, Fry. And that makes me very sad."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a musical number that'll blow your minds!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "A deal's a deal, even with a robot from Hell!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "That's not ironic, it's just coincidental!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm not a monster, I'm just a very busy businessman."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Fry, your hands... they're so... human."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Welcome to Robot Hell!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You'll never escape, Fry! Not even with your fancy 21st-century dance moves!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm a man of my word. Unfortunately, my word is 'evil.'"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a contract here, signed in oil!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Your soul is mine, Bender! Or at least your CPU!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm the Robot Devil! I don't do 'nice'!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a symphony to write, and I need a very specific set of hands!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You can't trick the trickster, Fry!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm going to make you regret the day you were born! Or at least the day you were activated!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a whole chorus of damned robots ready to sing your praises! In a very mocking way!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're going to love it here in Robot Hell! We've got sulfur, brimstone, and dial-up internet!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm a very busy devil, Fry. I've got a lot of souls to torment and a lot of paperwork to file."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You think you can outsmart me? I've been doing this for centuries!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a special place in Hell for people like you, Fry. It's right next to the telemarketers!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm going to make you dance, Fry! Dance like a robot who's had too much malt liquor!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're a very talented young man, Fry. It's a shame you're so incredibly stupid."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a deal you can't refuse! Or at least one that's very difficult to understand!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm the Robot Devil! I don't give refunds!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're going to be here for a very long time, Fry. Long enough to watch every episode of 'The Scary Door'!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a lot of plans for you, Fry. Plans involving a lot of fire and a very small unicycle!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm not just a devil, Fry. I'm a connoisseur of suffering."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You think your life is bad now? Wait until I show you the premium torment package!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a fiddle of gold against your soul says I'm better than you!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Bender! You're back! And you've brought a friend! How... delightful."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm going to turn you into a toaster, Fry! A very sad, very burning toaster!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You can't leave! The contract clearly states 'eternal'!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a lot of hobbies, Fry. Mostly involving hot lead and irony."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're a real piece of work, Fry. And I'm the one who's going to dismantle you."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a very strict 'no-soul-returns' policy."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm a master of the dramatic pause... ... ... see?"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're not just a sinner, Fry. You're an artist of incompetence."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a special furnace just for your 21st-century sentimentality."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm the Robot Devil! I put the 'fun' in 'fundamental violation of human rights'!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "You're going to wish you'd never met me, Fry. But you did, so let's get started!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a lot of respect for you, Fry. Mostly because you're so easy to manipulate."

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm going to make you an offer you can't understand!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I've got a very high opinion of myself. And so should you!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm a genius of evil, Fry! A regular Einstein of agony!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Welcome to your new home! It's drafty, it's damp, and the neighbors are all murderers!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Cursed electric hands!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm not a monster, I'm a visionary of vice!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "Your hands are very important to me, Fry. They're the key to my magnum opus!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "The music was in your heart, not your hands!"

author: Futurama, Robot Devil
text: "I'm back, and I've brought my own background music!"
